Interface IUserRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserRepository
public interface IUserRepository
Repository interface for User data access operations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle and Dependency Inversion Principle.

  • Method Summary

    Method

    boolean
    addAppliedInternship(String studentId, String applicationId)
    Add an application ID to student's applied internships list

    Clear student's internship records (both applied and accepted)
